org.codehaus.mojo.webstart.util

Interface IOUtil

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultIOUtil

    public interface IOUtil
    Helper for all IO operations.

    1.0-beta-4
    Author:
    tchemit

      • copyFileToDirectoryIfNecessary

        boolean copyFileToDirectoryIfNecessary(File sourceFile,
                                     File targetDirectory)
                                       throws org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException
        Conditionally copy the file into the target directory. The operation is not performed when the target file exists and is up to date. The target file name is taken from the sourceFile name.
        Parameters:
        sourceFile - source file to copy
        targetDirectory - location of the target directory where to copy file
        Returns:
        true when the file was copied, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException - if an error occurs attempting to copy the file.

      • makeDirectoryIfNecessary

        void makeDirectoryIfNecessary(File dir)
                              throws org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException
        Create the given directory if it does not exist.

        will throw an exception if could not perform the operation.

        Parameters:

        Throws:
        org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException - if could not create directory

                throws org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException

        fileFilter - filter to select files to delete
        Returns:
        the number of deleted files

      • renameTo

        void renameTo(File source,
            File target)
              throws org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException
        Rename a file.

        will throw an exception if could not perform the operation.

        Parameters:
        source - original file to renmae
        target - target file
        Throws:
        org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException - if could not rename file

      • copyResources

        void copyResources(URI uri,
                 ClassLoader classLoader,
                 File target)
                   throws org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException
        Copy a resource from the given uri to target file.

        The resource can come from class-path is the scheme is classpath, otherwise will try to get incoming resource from the url obtained from the uri.

        Parameters:
        uri - uri to copy
        classLoader - classloader used to find resource in from classpaht
        target - where to copy
        Throws:
        org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException - if something wrong happen
